Scope | Stockholm | Full-time | Developer

Scope is a search-engine that makes it easy for brands to find influencers. Our mission is to make influencer search accessible to all brands worldwide.

Why us

- New product with fast growing revenue.

- Small team, engaged customers.

- We like to go away for a week now and then to work together in a completely new location somewhere in the world.

You

- want to be part of creating something new and build the global standard for influencer search.

- understand trade-offs, value pragmatism over idealism.

- might like neural networks, talk about space or sing.

- might just like building a kick-ass search engine.

Salary: Yes

Equity possibilities: Yes. Meritocrazy ftw.

Apply in 2-3min: https://scopeapp.io/jobs

More info here: https://scopeapp.io/product
